name: Fascz Jül’le Oerna
description:
"Fascz jül’le oerna" is a conversation game where you try to connect with someone who does not speak your language. 

Is language necessary for human connection? or is there a connection in trying to understand? 

This is what this experience would be about...if we had finished on time u.u we'll be updating the complete game soon!

Made by:
Andrés Alamo (Script)
Patricia Navarro (Art) twitter.com/metmarfil
Erick Subero (Code)
Jorge Veloso (Art-Script) artstation.com/veldrinne
